tool_description: Provides currency exchange rates based on the markets and different reliable sources.
name: UltraCurrencyAPI
title: UltraCurrencyAPI

api_list.name: Rates
api_list.description: This endpoint returns latest rates for all currencies we support in json format.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ultracurrencyapi.p.rapidapi.com/rates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ultracurrencyapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ultracurrencyapi.p.rapidapi.com/rates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ultracurrencyapi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
